column1: Rule 1: Modifiers containing both an amino group (-NH2) and a carboxylic acid group
column2: Rule 5: Modifiers with multiple hydroxyl groups and a carboxylic acid group
column3: Rule 6: Modifiers with a nitro group attached to a phenyl ring with a carboxylic acid group
column4: Rule 10: Modifiers with a long aliphatic chain with a carboxylic acid group
column5: Rule 15: Modifiers with a benzofuran structure and a carboxylic acid group
